#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int x,long long int y)
{
    if(y!=0)
    {
        return gcd(y,x%y);
    }
    else
    {
        return x;
    }
}
int main()
{
    long long t,x1,x2,y1,y2,ans;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
        if(x2-x1==0 || y2-y1==0)
        {
            ans=0;
        }
        else
        {
            long long int dx=abs(x2-x1);
            long long int dy=abs(y2-y1),v;
            v=gcd(dx,dy);
            ans=dx+dy-v;
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
}
